queryList.queryString:
PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> 
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> 
PREFIX awg: <https://edition.anton-webern.ch/webern-onto#> 

 CONSTRUCT 
 WHERE { 
	 ?subject ?predicate ?object . 
 }

PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> 
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> 
PREFIX awg: <https://edition.anton-webern.ch/webern-onto#> 

 CONSTRUCT 
 WHERE { 
	 ?sketch a awg:Sketch . 
 }

PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> 
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> 
PREFIX awg: <https://edition.anton-webern.ch/webern-onto#> 

 CONSTRUCT 
 WHERE { 
	 ?paratext a awg:Paratext . 
 }

queryList.queryLabel: Finde alle mit Skizze Sk4 verknüpften Objekte
queryList.queryString:
PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> 
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> 
PREFIX awg: <https://edition.anton-webern.ch/webern-onto#> 

 CONSTRUCT 
 WHERE { 
	 awg:M317_Sk4 ?predicate ?object . 
 }

PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> 
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> 
PREFIX awg: <https://edition.anton-webern.ch/webern-onto#> 

 CONSTRUCT 
 WHERE { 
	 ?subject a ?predicate ; awg:concomitates ?object .
 }

queryList.queryLabel: Finde alle Objekte, die einer konkommittierenden Skizze vorausgehen
queryList.queryString:
PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> 
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> 
PREFIX awg: <https://edition.anton-webern.ch/webern-onto#> 

 CONSTRUCT 
 WHERE { 
	 ?ressource a ?ressource_class ; awg:precedes ?preceding_sketch .
 ?preceding_sketch awg:concomitates ?concomitating_sketch . 
 }

PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> 
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> 
PREFIX awg: <https://edition.anton-webern.ch/webern-onto#> 

 SELECT * 
 WHERE { 
	 ?subject ?predicate ?object . 
 }

queryList.queryLabel: Finde alle Ressource-Klassen und zähle deren Vorkommen
queryList.queryString:
PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> 
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> 
PREFIX awg: <https://edition.anton-webern.ch/webern-onto#> 

  SELECT ?ressource_class (COUNT (?ressource_class) AS ?count) 
 WHERE { 
	 ?ressource a ?ressource_class . 
 } 
 GROUP BY ?ressource_class 
 ORDER BY ?count 
 LIMIT 100

PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> 
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> 
PREFIX awg: <https://edition.anton-webern.ch/webern-onto#> 

 SELECT * 
 WHERE { 
	 ?sketch a awg:Sketch . 
 }

PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> 
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> 
PREFIX awg: <https://edition.anton-webern.ch/webern-onto#> 

 SELECT * 
 WHERE { 
	 ?paratext a awg:Paratext . 
 }

queryList.queryString:
PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> 
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> 
PREFIX awg: <https://edition.anton-webern.ch/webern-onto#> 

 SELECT * 
 WHERE { 
	 awg:M317_Sk4 ?predicate ?object . 
 }

PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> 
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> 
PREFIX awg: <https://edition.anton-webern.ch/webern-onto#> 

 SELECT *

	 ?subject a ?predicate ; awg:concomitates ?object .
 }

queryList.queryLabel: Finde alle Objekte, die einer konkommittierenden Skizze vorausgehen
queryList.queryString:
PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> 
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> 
PREFIX awg: <https://edition.anton-webern.ch/webern-onto#> 

 SELECT * 
 WHERE { 
	 ?ressource a ?ressource_class ; awg:precedes ?preceding_sketch .
 ?preceding_sketch awg:concomitates ?concomitating_sketch . 
 }
